pageContext.claim: “I was never a big fan of John McCain, disagreed with him on many things including ridiculous endless wars and the lack of success he had in dealing with the VA and our great Vets, but the lowering of our Nations American Flags, and the first class funeral he was given by our John a loser and swear on whatever, or whoever, I was asked to swear on, that I never called our great fallen soldiers anything other than HEROES. This is more made up Fake News given by disgusting & jealous failures in a disgraceful attempt to influence the 2020 Election!”
pageContext.analysis: In reality, the MISSION Act signed by Trump expanded an effort spearheaded by McCain in 2014, known as VA Choice, and was {actually named after the late senator}.
